title: Teach Your Children Well (Part 3 of 4) - Listen to Truth For Life with Alistair Begg, May 31, 2024
text: []https://www.oneplace.com/ministries/truth-for-life/ Teach Your Children Well (Part 3 of 4) May 31, 2024 00:00 It’s easy for parents and children to overwhelm each other! On Truth For Life, Alistair Begg first points out why Christian parenting should be distinctly different from the prevailing culture, then teaches how to train children without exasperating them. Proverbs 22:6; Ephesians 6:4 References: Proverbs 22:6 , Ephesians 6:4 Featured Offer []https://www.oneplace.com/r?oid=32452&sid=163&acid=2 Faith Builder Catechism: Devotions to Level Up Your Family Discipleship By: Kevin Hippolyte, Jared Kennedy, and Trey Kullman - This collection of fifty-two questions and answers teaches young teens the foundational truths in the Bible. The book uses a fun video game to provide a comprehensive overview of Christian doctrine in a way that’s engaging and easy to understand. Young readers will learn about God—His authority, creative power, and majesty—and the eternal life offered only through Jesus. Faith Builder Catechism will help young people understand that God’s Word is truth. They’ll learn about God’s nature, His kingdom, and His instructions for our lives, including what it means to take seriously the Ten Commandments. A section in the book is dedicated to explaining the Gospel clearly and explores the Lord’s Prayer and what it means to pray: “Give us today our daily bread” and “Your kingdom come.” This book will enable middle schoolers to distinguish clearly between the truth of God’s Word and the false narratives that are so pervasive in the prevailing culture. Each weekly reading concludes with a prayer.
